2: [{'page':'Home Page', 'function':[{'funcion':'Select Source Currency', 'params':[{'name':'test_url','description':'the url for test'},{'name':'source_currency_dropdown_id','description':'the dropdown component id of the source currency'},{'name':'source_currency_value','description':'the value of the source currency option to select'}]},{'funcion':'Select Target Currency', 'params':[{'name':'test_url','description':'the url for test'},{'name':'target_currency_dropdown_id','description':'the dropdown component id of the target currency'},{'name':'target_currency_value','description':'the value of the target currency option to select'}]},{'funcion':'Enter Amount', 'params':[{'name':'test_url','description':'the url for test'},{'name':'amount_input_box_id','description':'the input box component id for the amount'},{'name':'amount_value','description':'the amount of source currency to enter'}]},{'funcion':'Convert Button', 'params':[{'name':'convert_button_id','description':'the convert button component id'}]},{'funcion':'Display Conversion Result', 'params':[{'name':'test_url','description':'the url for test'},{'name':'result_box_id','description':'the conversion result display box component id'}]},{'funcion':'Exchange Rate Info', 'params':[{'name':'test_url','description':'the url for test'},{'name':'exchange_rate_info_id','description':'the exchange rate information display component id'}]}]},{'page':'Currency Details Page', 'function':[{'funcion':'Currency Information', 'params':[{'name':'test_url','description':'the url for test'},{'name':'currency_info_id','description':'the currency information display component id'}]},{'funcion':'Historical Exchange Rates', 'params':[{'name':'test_url','description':'the url for test'},{'name':'historical_rates_id','description':'the historical exchange rates display component id'}]}]}
3:
Here are the required parameters' values for each test in the spec provided:

1. Home page:
	* The url for test should be `'http://localhost:8000/'`.
	* The welcome message element's id is `welcome_message_id`.
2. PasswordOptions page:
	* The length input box component id of the length is `length_input_id`.
	* The checkbox id of the generator option 'include uppercase' is `include_uppercase_id`.
	* The checkbox id of the generator option 'include lowercase' is `include_lowercase_id`.
	* The checkbox id of the generator option 'include numbers' is `include_numbers_id`.
	* The checkbox id of the generator option 'include symbols' is `include_symbols_id`.
	* The button id of submitting the "generate password" form is `generate_button_id`.
3. GeneratedPassword page:
	* The generated password element's id is `display_password_id`.
	* The button id of copying generated password is `copy_button_id`.
4. About page:
	* The hyperlink id of about page in the home page is `about_link_id`.
5. Description:
	* The id of the description element is `description_id`.
9:
The required values for the test parameters are as follows:

1. 'test_url': http://localhost:8000/
2. 'overview_text_id': The component ID of the product overview text in the homepage HTML file.
3. 'link_id': The link component ID for redirecting to the features page from the homepage HTML file.
4. 'features_list_id': The component ID of the key features list in the features page HTML file.
5. 'back_home_id': The component ID of hyperlink that links to the homepage, present in the features and pricing pages HTML files.
6. 'pricing_table_id': The component ID of the pricing table in the pricing page HTML file.
7. 'contact_form_id': The component ID of contact form in the pricing page HTML file.
8. 'name_input_name': The name attribute of the name input field in the contact form of the pricing page HTML file.
9. 'email_input_name': The name attribute of the email input field in the contact form of the pricing page HTML file.
10. 'submit_button_id': The component ID of submitting the message in the contact form, present in the pricing page HTML file.
11. 'message_input_name': The name attribute of the message input filed in the contact form of the pricing page HTML file.
12. 'issue_input_name': The name attribute of the issue input field in the contact form of the support page HTML file.

Please note that these are default values and may vary depending on the specific implementation of the test.
